short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Google apps to find lodging, driving directions, car, air and curated content nearby your location.

Enjoy the new landing page with the customizable launcher of your Google applications, with the Smart Meets Heart icon showing you which ones are "trip-enabled"  (êœ±á´‡á´‡ á´‡xá´€á´á´˜ÊŸá´‡ êœ±Êœá´á´¡É´ á´€Ê™á´á´ á´‡). 

This extension turns your desktop into a beautiful, inspiring canvas.  We have curated more than a thousand inspirational and aspirational images from our partner Unsplash.  Don't like an image?  Just refresh your screen.  

Use the Smart Trip Pin, powered by TravelingToGiveâ„¢, to plan your trip right from your various Google products, including the Google Calendar, Contacts, Map and Chrome Search and become eligible for royalties and donations on each trip.

Smart Trip Pin for Google Chrome is now available on a limited basis for frequent travelers who book a minimum of 4 â€“ 6 hotel room nights per month and regularly use Google Extensions.  

á´¡Êœá´€á´› á´…á´á´‡êœ± Éªá´› á´…á´? (á´¡á´€á´›á´„Êœ á´›Êœá´‡ á´ Éªá´…á´‡á´ á´›á´ êœ±á´‡á´‡ á´¡Êœá´€á´› êœ±á´á´€Ê€á´› á´›Ê€Éªá´˜ á´˜ÉªÉ´ á´…á´á´‡êœ±)
Activate the Smart Trip Pin Extension and book lodging nearby any location and also get driving directions, rent a car and buy an air ticket from: 

1.	Chrome Browser search 
2.	Google Calendar entry for a meeting 
3.	Google Contact manager 
4.     Google Maps
5.	Events.com Discoverâ„¢ search 
6.     LinkedInâ„¢

We are adding new partners for this product all the time.

á´›Êœá´‡ êœ±á´‡á´€Ê€á´„Êœ á´¡ÉªÉ´á´…á´á´¡ (êœ±á´‡á´‡ á´‡xá´€á´á´˜ÊŸá´‡êœ± êœ±Êœá´á´¡É´ á´€Ê™á´á´ á´‡)
The Find Lodging Nearby search window will be populated automatically from most searches done on Chrome for a specific place or company name.  

NOTE:  If your search doesn't populate automatically, you may highlight the place, address or company name and it will send that to the search box.  You may also "right click" when you highlight any company or place name or any address.  

Our most powerful tool is in Google Calendar.  If you have a calendar entry that is for a meeting at a specific location, the Find Lodging Nearby search window will show the search criteria for that date and location.  Literally one click search for travel to your meeting. 

For a contact entry with a physical address, the search window will search for that location and you only need to enter the travel date.  

á´›Êœá´‡ Ê€á´‡êœ±á´œÊŸá´›êœ± (êœ±á´‡á´‡ á´‡xá´€á´á´˜ÊŸá´‡ êœ±Êœá´á´¡É´ á´€Ê™á´á´ á´‡)
The results will be focused on the properties closest to your destination.  It will include hotels, motels, private homes, apartments, condos and villas.   You may sort and filter in a number of ways from the results.

Yes, in fact we stand by the fact that our prices will be the lowest that are publicly available.  We provide a 110% best rate guarantee on all hotel bookings.  

Additionally, join our VIP Program and benefit from deep discounts.

It is FREE to use the Smart Trip Pin Extension.  

Additionally, if you register your account with us, we will track your bookings and when you reach 10 bookings, youâ€™ll automatically be upgraded to our GOLD level, which makes you immediately eligible for a  donation to your favorite charity.  You also get access to some cool new tools, such as our Smart Event Suite.

You may also elect to upgrade for a small monthly or annual fee if you regularly hold events.  Think of us as your event sponsor!

Êœá´‡Ê€á´‡â€™êœ± Êœá´á´¡ Éªá´› á´¡á´Ê€á´‹êœ±

â€¢	Save time with hotel, car and air booking, plus driving directions and trip estimates integrated in your calendar, search, contacts and other Google products. 

â€¢	Use the Smart Trip Pin extension on any webpage in Chrome, by highlighting the name of a company, place, venue, or address. Click on the pin, it will automatically find places to stay nearby. 

â€¢	Give back with every trip.  We donate to Mercury One on every trip that you take.   Bring help and hope to those in need each time you book a trip.

â€¢	Millions of hotels, vacation rentals, whole houses, condos available globally with immediate booking confirmation. 

â€¢	110% Best Price Guarantee on lodging with 24/7 support in 40 languages.

Activate and then register your Extension with us by joining our beta group by filling out the form here.

It takes just minutes.  For the first 100 that download the Smart Trip Extension and that join our beta group, you will earn $1 per booking during the beta test period (through the end of 2024) and you will also accrue donation to your favorite charity, in exchange for feedback on our tool.   

You will have access to our Smart Tool Portal, so that you may view your progress toward your goal, or if you travel more than 4-6 times a month, it would benefit you to upgrade your account to begin earning right away on your first booking.
